original_title: Heil Hitler und Alaaf! Karneval in der NS-Zeit
overview: The film is the documentary reappraisal of the carnival taboo topic par excellence, "Carnival under the swastika". First of all: He existed! See numerous historical recordings of Rose Monday parades and meetings of the 1930s.
title: Heil Hitler und Alaaf! Karneval in der NS-Zeit
